INTERACTION

I MAKE GAMES, ACTUALLY

Click and drag the cube around!

I don't plan on using Three.js interaction much. The whole point of this is to use something other than Unity and doing interaction in this feels a whole lot like Unity but worse in every way.

If I wanted to code interaction I would use a more object-oriented system that actually works for interaction like, I don't know, Unity.

This page is more just to prove that I can do it than anything else. I wanted to figure out how mapping events on the HTML page to Three.js scripts works, but this kind of sucks. Namely, the click-and-drag code seems to have removed your ability to highlight the text which drives me insane.
